text: Is there a way to prevent the HS tracking code from loading on a specific HS page?

Hi I don't know if I am in the correct place, I am not a website developer in fact I am not very computer literate, but I am learning. I am trying to develop my website using Hubstop Templates with a lot of difficulties I have managed to do most of the front page still got a lot to go, is there anyone that can help me or point me in the correct direction I am on a tight budget hence I have been trying to do most of the work myself but struggling I need help and direction. Kind Regards

Hello Community  - I am Luciano from Troops (recently acquired by Salesforce)
We have an App (appId: 222298) published on the HubSpot Marketplace and we need to rotate secrets (Client Id and Client Secret) for this App it’s the company’s security policy.
looking on this discussion <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/How-we-can-rotate-client-secret/m-p/528800#:~:text=You%20will%20have%20to%20work,be%20reinstalled%20on%20the%20portals|here> looks like it can only achieved by a support request

So hope someone can help here.

Thanks

Question: it looks like the page to build a custom template have some out of date instructions:
<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/design-manager/build-a-custom-coded-template>

In particular, I cannot find the path `*Marketing* > *Files and Templates* > *Design Tools*.

Does anyone know how to upload my own html and css?
I think it is related to your Account Tier.

you have the "Design Tools" in the first dropdown itself because that is the only "Files and Templates" option available to your account

For other accounts, Files + HubDB are additional available options, so all 3 are available as a sub menu under "Files and Templates"
I have another question: I am trying to import my own custom html, css and JS code to HubSpot. What would be the way to do that?
Apologies. I am not familiar with that. That would be a question for the larger forum.
Hello everyone, I am trying to import my own custom html, css and JS code to HubSpot. Is there a recommended way to do that?

:sparkles:Slack Tips and Best Practices:sparkles:

To get the most out the HubSpot Developer Slack, follow these best practices:

• Will your post/question potentially help more than one person? Ask in a public channel instead of 1:1 DMs to help as many folks as possible. 
• Thread all replies to keep topics organized and searchable
• Thread followup questions/comments to your original post
• Don't post the same question in multiple channels. If you must, link to your original question in new channels.
More <https://slack.com/blog/collaboration/etiquette-tips-in-slack|great tips here>. Thanks for making the HubSpot Developer Slack easier to use for everyone!
Hello, is there a way to exports all the emails under the contacts?
Do you have the integration installed? <https://ecosystem.HubSpot.com/marketplace/apps/sales/crm/sugar-crm> . That should sync all properties captured by forms.
Yes you can  export all contact
